data.name: MAZE RUNNER
data.detailed_description:
You start the game as a cyborg, lost in the world of the Maze. He will need to find and collect all the orbs that will unlock the door to his freedom. He will have fifteen minutes to do so, before he gets lost forever. But the big problem is that the Maze will not make it easy and will unleash the barbarians that will try to stop you, even if they need to eliminate you. Be the one to unlock the doors to freedom. How does it feel to be lost? Trying to find an exit. Very soon you will know the adventure of MAZE RUNNER.

Features:
• Completed mazes as third-person shooter.
• Collect 7 different weapons and ammo.
• Collect 3 orbs per level to unlock the doors.
• Eliminated over 40 different enemies.
• You have 15 minutes to complete each level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
